description: Part retrospective application for landscaping alterations and works to the garden of the Canonbury Tavern Public House.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Planning Design and Access Statement; Arboricultural Report including drawing 2009/523 Rev A; 3 photographs of current garden; Location Plan; Planting Schedule; ED/088/04; (LBI REG: 15201) 6 photographs of previous garden prior to the unauthorised works; 9895 07 Rev E (LBI REG: 15202) LP/088/01 REV 3 (LBI REG: 15204) CS/088/01-03 Cross Section from Master Plan MP/088/01 Rev 2 (LBI REG: 15205) Hann Tucker Associates The Canonbury Public House Islington Report 16504/PA1 including Figure 1 (LBI REG : 15206)

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
